channel.title: My Zombie Horde (World event)
channel.description:
Hey not much to show off as I've only been working on it a few days.
Please note any lag is probably caused by my screen recorder https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Z7Fx7xa3aqc
Also, my server is a pvp server and this world event forces players to work as a team to defeat the horde. I'm working on bosses dependant on player total and levels.
Updated this lately :)
Opinions?

item.title: My Zombie Horde (World event)
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

should probably make this more sophisticated (universal time, bunkers and “safe spots,” etc.)

Read full topic

item.title: My Zombie Horde (World event)
item.dc:creator: @Loading_please_wait1 Loading please wait
item.description:
@Loading_please_wait1 wrote:

[quote=“MrSenior420, post:3, topic:553408”][quote author=Cres link=topic=672318.msg4496311#msg4496311 date=1443222978]
This is absolutely amazing…

I can just imagine a 1v1 duel turning into a 2 ppl vs zombie horde just for the hell of it xD
[/quote]

Haha, thank you, although I’m thinking of disabling it when you’re in a minigame like fight caves or pest control

Cheers for support. :)[/quote]

Leave it how it is. Zombies don’t give any sympathy.

Read full topic

item.title: My Zombie Horde (World event)
